paragraphs.text: University Institute of Engineering and Technology (UIET), established in 2002, is a prestigious in-campus Department of Panjab University, Chandigarh. The campus is Wi-Fi enabled and spans over 10.5 acres of lush greenery, featuring three academic blocks and a dedicated workshop. It hosts nearly 2,500 students from across India and abroad. ğŸ«ğŸŒ³
Panjab University Chandigarh, founded in 1882, boasts 78 teaching and research departments across a 550-acre campus in Chandigarh. It's known for its rich heritage and academic excellence. ğŸ“ğŸ“š

Goonj, the annual Techno-Cultural fest of UIET, is a flagship event that embodies the spirit of cultural and technical enthusiasm among students.
